text:
I want you to keep a journal. Write about what happened today,
your thoughts, what troubled you, what made you happy──

────Ah...
I wish you could tell me more about it in words, Toru.
"Today was a lesson. It was tough."

"Good job. I'd like you to write about how the lesson
went and if there were any problems."... Like that.

"Today we went around greeting people. It went well.
Troubles→None in particular."

"Alright! Let's cherish that feeling!
I'd be happy if you could write more thoughts."

"Today we did a costume fitting.
The fabric was amazing. It was good."

"Thank you. Let's aim to dance in those clothes! You can
write about anything else, like drawings, poems, or school."

"Hey, don't slack off. Really, anything is fine.
Keep records and build on them properly!"

(My phone's not connecting...
Hazuki-san and everyone else haven't heard anything...)

(...I don't think there's anything... but...
...Maybe I've been... too noisy...)

What... you...! I was worried...!
What happened, finding you in a place like this──

Because I was worried...! ...Because you wrote
in your journal that you're "going on a journey".

...
Haa... Yeah... I guess so... It's my fault...

...Oh my god, my breath
You ran so fast, huh?

Yeah...
...Because I'm... entrusted with... Toru's... precious time...

...I want to understand a little more...
about Toru...
If I could do that... this wouldn't happen...
────Since I'm in this with you, I'll also keep a journal.
